trans-unit.source: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 控制用户界面和剪贴板相关的权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Drawing and user input events in windows are user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Windows 中的绘制和用户输入的事件是用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The permission to use windows can be one of the following: unrestricted, limited to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>, only <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>, or no window drawing or user input event access allowed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 windows 的权限可以是以下之一︰ 不受限制，限制为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>，则只<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>，或没有绘制的窗口或用户输入事件允许的访问。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> are restricted in title and size to prevent possible spoofing by potentially harmful code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>在标题和大小，以避免通过潜在的有害代码可能欺骗中受限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow></xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: The permission to use the Clipboard can be one of the following: unrestricted, write-only, or no Clipboard access allowed.
trans-unit.target: 使用剪贴板的权限可以是以下之一︰ 没有剪贴板访问权限允许或不受限制，只写。

trans-unit.source: The paste limitation prevents potentially harmful applications from taking data from the Clipboard without the user's consent, while still allowing the cut, copy, and paste operations when initiated by the user through keyboard commands.
trans-unit.target: 粘贴限制阻止可能有害的应用程序而无需用户的同意，同时仍允许剪切、 复制和粘贴操作时由用户通过键盘命令启动剪贴板中获取数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref> class with either fully restricted or unrestricted access, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref>使用完全受限制或不受限制的访问权限，为指定的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates either the fully restricted (`None`) or the `Unrestricted` form of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`形式的权限。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The state parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: state 参数不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref> class with the permissions for the Clipboard, and no access to windows.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref>类剪贴板以及无法访问 windows 的权限。

trans-unit.source: To set both the Clipboard and window permissions, use the constructor that takes parameters for both.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的剪贴板和窗口的权限，请使用采用两个参数的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The clipboardFlag parameter is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: clipboardFlag 参数不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref> class with the permissions for windows, and no access to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref>具有 windows 和没有对剪贴板的访问权限的类。

trans-unit.source: To set both the Clipboard and window permissions, use the constructor that takes parameters for both.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的剪贴板和窗口的权限，请使用采用两个参数的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The windowFlag parameter is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: windowFlag 参数不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref> class with the specified permissions for windows and the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission"></xref>类具有指定权限的 windows 和剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The windowFlag parameter is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: windowFlag 参数不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: -or- The clipboardFlag parameter is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: -或- clipboardFlag 参数不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Clipboard access represented by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由权限表示的剪贴板访问权限。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 当前权限的副本。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新构造具有指定状态的 XML 编码的权限。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The esd parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The esd parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The esd parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: esd 参数不是有效的权限元素。

trans-unit.source: -or- The esd parameter's version number is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -或- esd 参数的版本号无效。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回是当前权限和指定的权限的交集的权限。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the least permissive values of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> from those in the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，它表示的权限级别最低值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>中当前权限和指定的权限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前权限和指定的权限的交集的一个新权限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 此新权限为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交集为空。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 参数不是并且不是与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功用于当前权限的所有要求也成功都完成指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。

trans-unit.source: That is, the specified permission contains at least the permissions contained in the subset.
trans-unit.target: 它是指定的权限至少包含的子集中包含的权限。

trans-unit.source: For IsSubsetOf to return `true`, both the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> values of the current permission must be equal to or less permissive than the values of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 有关 IsSubsetOf 返回`true`，这两个<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>当前权限的值必须等于或比指定权限的值不太宽松。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: A permission to test for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前权限是指定权限; 的子集否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 参数不是并且不是与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前权限不受限制;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 权限，包括任何状态信息的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 创建权限和指定的权限的并集的权限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to Union is a permission that represents all the operations represented by the current permission as well as all the operations represented by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 对联合的调用的结果是表示由当前的权限表示的所有操作，以及由指定权限表示的所有操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it represents the most permissive values of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> from those in the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，它表示的最大权限值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>中当前权限和指定的权限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 若要与当前权限合并的权限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定的权限的新权限。

trans-unit.source: The target parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: target 参数不是并且不是与当前权限属于同一类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window access represented by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由权限表示的窗口访问。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow"></xref>值。
